page.title: 01About our D-block.
page.content: Our 12km block is packed out with countryside.It is in the Eden valley in Cumbria.The land in the valley is hilly with some woodland.The river Eden runs through our block on its way to the Solway Firth,and the fells,the Pennines,run at the edge of our block. There are a lot of farms in our block and most of them are dairy farms with some sheep farming.Few crops are grown -turnips, potatoes and barley, but the main crop is grass as silage or hay.There is only one village in our block and two small hamlets with scattered farmhouses.The nearest town is Appleby,about 5 miles away. Many people work on farms or in jobs connected with farming. Many people have lived in this area for all their lives, although there are some people who have moved here from towns and cities.
